data.text:
The One With Monica And Chandler's Wedding Pt. I

Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, Joey is starring in a movie with a prestigious actor with a spitting problem.

The One With Monica And Chandler's Wedding Pt. II

Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

Episode 15

Among the guests on Graham's sofa are British Hollywood star Gary Oldman, appearing in new movie `Robocop', comic actor Nick Frost and Toni Collete.

New Year's Eve Show

Together on Graham's big Hogmanay sofa: Hollywood great Hugh Jackman with his co-stars Zac Efron and Zendaya from the new musical spectacular about PT Barnum, `The Greatest Showman'. Also, the star of 2017's hit returning drama `Doctor Foster', Suranne Jones, and Oscar-nominated actor Gary Oldman, playing Winston Churchill in `Darkest Hour'. With music by the Leading Ladies, performing `One Night Only'.
